favourite.article: When I first sang this song I was thinking about Lilly (an adult in our church).

I first heard this song as a teenager in New Zealand when some brothers were teaching us the guitar. I have since then always come back and gained encouragement from the words which reminds me that our function is just to shine! - To be a vessel to contain God's life - a mirror beholding and reflecting the glory of the Lord. May we be so simple not to care for 'knowing' or 'striving' so much - to simply feed on Him and He will take care of us.
I have been searching for all the verses and am so happy to have found them.
Does anyone know who was the composer of this beautiful song?

I have always appreciated this small song, especially while I was uncomfortably pregnant with my daughter. All I could do was trust the Lord, and sing Him this song in simplicity was a big help. I had forgotten all the stanzas, so I'm thankful to the Lord that Jamal shared them.
I appreciate that the Lord has called the saints to create this website reference and use it often. Thank you.

This song is a good reminder of our position before the Lord... to be a simple, open vessel, turned toward Him every day! Lord Jesus, make us poor in spirit and willing to receive whatever You have in store for us today.
I had never heard this song before, and appreciate the words very much. Thank you, Jamal, for the lyrics you added on May 21, 2010.
Thx for this song. I was supplied. This song makes me return to Him and I know I'm just a little flower.
When I went through this particular song,I realize my self to be nothing but a lily flower. It was so touching. I will be this lily flower open to the Lord. Wow
Praise the Lord! Make me Your lily flower and just be so open to You!
Can't be so high-minded nor arrogant. Thank GOD that I'm should be just a little flower with open face to Thee. Lord Jesus, I love You.
What a touching song!
♥♥i'm just a little flower..
Praise the Lord we can be a little flower fully trust in God! I'm a lily trusting in God!
Ya when we were in the children's meeting with Danielle we sang this so many times AND I STILL LOVE IT!!!
I like this song because it's very peaceful and lovely.
I love this song!!!! I memorized it when I was about 3 years old.
Such a simple song, yet very sweet. Lord, remind me to be fully turned to You.
It's as gentle and special as my sister and I. We're 7 and 3 1/2 years old.
Coming into the church life as a young man more than thirty years ago has been the highlight of my whole life. This little song reflects my heart always new and fresh filled with God's grace.
It's true that we are just a lily trusting God... whatever our situation is we must trust in Him... we must learn how to live by faith.

When i came across this song, I got so excited because when I was a little girl this song was my favourite, so much so I made my mum sing it to me all the time. As a child I was a bit sensitive and found solace in the fact that no matter what I can trust God in all things. Actually no matter how old you get you can never graduate from trusting God. Actually at the moment I'm at a cross roads in my life and it is still nice to know that whatever I do, just trust in God. Just be a lilly trusting in God.

I am a young person with a lot of hope, dream, and ambition. One day the Lord came and dealt with my situation. Everything changes abruptly, until I confess that all my hope, dreams, and ambition are just a piece of vanity. Only on Him we should settle our hope, dream, and ambition. Only in Christ we found a perfect peace and rest.
